#summary Source code

== Command-Line Access ==

The !SymPy source code is at !GitHub: https://github.com/sympy/sympy/.

Use this command to check out the latest project source code:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/sympy/sympy.git
}}}

You can browse the repository online at [https://github.com/sympy/sympy/ GitHub].

You may also go to the original googlecode [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/source/browse/ Source tab].
